page.title: 12LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Astronomy is my best hobby.I have got a telescope 200*50mm.I have got 8 books on it.When it gets dark in the winter I go outside and set my telescope up.I have got a 200* lens, a 50* lens and a barrel lens.Sometimes I see the moon through it and I saw Saturn's Rings as well and all the constellations.Once I saw a programme on T.V. about astronomy by Patrick Moore and he told you all about Hailey's Comet. It is coming in 1986.Its orbit is 76 years and was last seen in 1910.One night I went to bed at 6.00 o'clock because I got up at 2.00 o'clock(in the morning) and set up my telescope .I looked at the full moon. You could see most of the craters on it.
